attributes.action: All MP's to receive national living wage
attributes.additional_details:
The government has for too long allowed MP's to have free reign on their income and expenses! Costing the UK taxpayer considerably!

MP's are public servants! They should be paid the national living wage in order to hold the correct values for the benefit of the country, not their wallets.
attributes.background:
A petition to change MP's salaries to the national living wage for the hours they work. 
Thus saving the UK taxpayer money

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority (IPSA) is responsible for deciding on MPs' expenses and pay. IPSA is independent of both Parliament and Government.

You can find out how to contact IPSA here:

http://www.theipsa.org.uk/about-us/contact-us/
